amendment.description: To provide that, of the amount appropriated by this title under the heading "MILITARY CONSTRUCTION, ARMY", $4,550,000 shall be made available for the construction of a military police complex at Fort Gordon, Georgia, and to provide an offset.

action.text: Amendment SA 1861 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Chambliss.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1861 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
